sentence.Network_en: I have a pillow with my name embroidered on it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我有一个绣着我名字的枕头。

sentence.Network_en: Sam snuggled down in his pillow and fell asleep.

sentence.Network_en: Tendrils of hair strayed to the edge of her pillow.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的几缕头发散落在枕边。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English pyle, pylu, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch peluw and German Pfühl, based on Latin pulvinus 'cushion'

entry.def: A pillow is a rectangular cushion which you rest your head on when you are in bed.

means.word_mean: 1. a cushion to support the head of a sleeping person
1. rest on or as if on a pillow;

auth_sentence.content: Then you go home and sob into your pillow.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then you go home and sob into your pillow.

auth_sentence.content: Sung thee asleep, his loving breast thy pillow.

sentences.en: He fell asleep as soon as he touched the pillow.
sentences.cn: 他脑袋一碰枕头就睡着了。

sentences.en: She was found asleep on a pillow of leaves.
sentences.cn: 有人看见她枕着树叶睡着了。
